title: TA
content: How to become a teaching assistant? What are the steps for it and what work will u be doing as a teaching assistant?

comments.body:
This has been answered in detail already in the FAQs: https://bit.ly/pesu-faq.

Why doesn't anyone try to use the FAQs, it's literally the first post that shows up on this subreddit when you open it

Hi. It depends on the subject you are applying for.   
  
You department will release a **STAP - Student teaching assistantship Program Form** after your 6th semester's summer comes to an end. You need to fill the form, after which there will be an interview and you will be selected.
